description: Comprehensive knowledge base of PlayQ AmdocsCRM automation commands with syntax, description, and examples for CoPilot-assisted test case authoring.

commands.name: Login using Microsoft SSO
commands.description: Logs into Amdocs CRM web application using Microsoft SSO credentials and initiates a PlayQ session.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Login using Microsoft SSO -sessionName:"demoAmdocsCRM" -url:"#{env.url}" -username:"#{env.crm_user}" -password:"#{env.crm_password}" -options:"{ mfa: true }"

commands.name: Logout
commands.description: Logs out from the current Amdocs CRM session and closes the active browser instance.

commands.name: Input Text
commands.description: Inputs text into a specified Amdocs CRM field identified by label or name.

commands.name: Input Date
commands.description: Sets the date value in a calendar picker or input box.

commands.name: Input Time
commands.description: Fills a time field (HH:MM AM/PM format).

commands.name: Input Lookup
commands.description: Searches and selects a record from a lookup dialog (e.g., Account, Owner, Queue).

commands.name: Input Lookup If Empty
commands.description: Sets lookup value only if no existing record is present.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Input Lookup If Empty -Field:"Owner" -Text:"System Admin" -Options:""

commands.name: Input Dropdown
commands.description: Selects a value from a dropdown or combo list.

commands.name: Input Checkbox
commands.description: Toggles a checkbox to true or false.

commands.name: Click Button
commands.description: Clicks a button or toolbar action by its visible text or aria-label.

commands.name: Click Tab
commands.description: Switches between form tabs such as Customer Details, Service Details, or Billing.

commands.name: Click Link
commands.description: Clicks a hyperlink or linked record on the page.

commands.name: Click Left Menu
commands.description: Navigates to a section via the left menu (e.g., Customer 360, Service).

commands.name: Click Left Menu Then Sub Menu
commands.syntax: AmdocsCRM: Click Left Menu -Text:{string} -Then Sub Menu -Text:{string}
commands.description: Opens a submenu item within the left navigation tree.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Click Left Menu -Text:"Customer" -Then Sub Menu -Text:"Service Requests"

commands.name: Click Dialog Button
commands.description: Clicks confirm or cancel in pop-up dialogs.

commands.name: Table Input Filter
commands.description: Filters a data table or grid based on provided text.

commands.name: Table Row Select
commands.description: Selects a table row by index or matching text.

commands.name: Verify Table Cell Value Contains
commands.syntax: AmdocsCRM: Verify Table Cell Value Contains -Text:{string} -Row:{string} -Column:{string} -Options:{string}
commands.description: Checks if a table cell contains the expected substring.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Verify Table Cell Value Contains -Text:"Active" -Row:"1" -Column:"Status" -Options:""

commands.name: Store Table Row Count
commands.syntax: AmdocsCRM: Store Table Row Count -To Variable:{string} -Options:{string}
commands.description: Stores the total number of table rows into a variable.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Store Table Row Count -To Variable:"rowCount" -Options:""

commands.name: Wait For Loader To Disappear
commands.syntax: AmdocsCRM: Wait For Loader To Disappear -Options:{string}
commands.description: Waits for the Amdocs loader/spinner element to vanish before continuing.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Wait For Loader To Disappear -Options:"timeout=10s"

commands.name: Wait And Verify Page Header
commands.syntax: AmdocsCRM: Wait And Verify Page Header -Text:{string} -Options:{string}
commands.description: Waits until the specified header text appears on the page.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Wait And Verify Page Header -Text:"Customer Overview" -Options:""

commands.name: Verify Input Value
commands.description: Validates that a form field displays the expected text value.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Verify Input Value -Field:"Customer Name" -Text:"John Smith" -Options:""

commands.name: Verify Notification
commands.description: Checks that a notification or toast message appears with matching text.

commands.name: Create Service Request
commands.description: Creates a new Service Request record under the current customer profile.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Create Service Request -Category:"Billing" -Description:"Invoice not received" -Queue:"Finance" -Options:""

commands.name: Assign Service Request
commands.description: Assigns an SR to a queue or CSR for resolution.

commands.name: Change Service Request Status
commands.description: Updates SR status (e.g., Open â†’ Resolved).

commands.name: Approve Service Request
commands.description: Approves a pending SR workflow step.

commands.name: Suspend Service
commands.description: Suspends a customer's active service in the Service Details tab.

commands.name: Resume Service
commands.description: Resumes a previously suspended service.

commands.name: Link Billing Account
commands.description: Links a CRM customer to an ICCBS billing account.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Link Billing Account -Field:"Billing Account Number" -Text:"BA123456789" -Options:""

commands.name: Activate Service
commands.description: Activates a pending or suspended customer service.

commands.name: Disconnect Service
commands.description: Disconnects a customer's line or broadband service.

commands.name: Assign Input Value To Variable
commands.syntax: AmdocsCRM: Assign Input Value To Variable -Field:{string} -To Variable:{string} -Options:{string}
commands.description: Extracts a field value and assigns it to a variable.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Assign Input Value To Variable -Field:"Customer ID" -To Variable:"custId" -Options:""

commands.name: Assign Table Cell Value To Variable
commands.syntax: AmdocsCRM: Assign Table Cell Value To Variable -Row:{string} -Column:{string} -To Variable:{string} -Options:{string}
commands.description: Stores a specific table cell value for reuse in later steps.
commands.example: * AmdocsCRM: Assign Table Cell Value To Variable -Row:"1" -Column:"MSISDN" -To Variable:"phoneNo" -Options:""

commands.name: Refresh Page
commands.description: Reloads the current CRM page or form.

commands.name: Scroll
commands.description: Scrolls vertically relative to a visible field.

commands.name: Upload File
commands.description: Uploads a file or document attachment to the record.

commands.name: Download File
commands.description: Downloads a linked or attached file from CRM.

commands.name: Capture Screenshot
commands.description: Captures a screenshot of the current page or form for debugging and reporting.

commands.name: Store Session Variable
commands.description: Stores a runtime session variable for reuse across steps.

commands.name: Wait
commands.description: Introduces an explicit wait or delay (e.g., timeout=5s).
